name: dro_spawn_04
text: My quiver and bow are ready!
text_simple: my quiver and bow are ready

name: drow_battlebegins_01
text: I'm notched, I'm taut, I'm ready to fly.
text_simple: im notched im taut im ready to fly

name: drow_firstblood_01
text: First blood, and a point well taken.
text_simple: first blood and a point well taken

name: dro_cast_01
text: I have waited for this moment...
text_simple: i have waited for this moment

name: dro_ability_05
text: I seal you all in silence!
text_simple: i seal you all in silence

name: drow_levelup_06
text: The secrets of the wood are mine!
text_simple: the secrets of the wood are mine

name: drow_levelup_07
text: Hm hm hm hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha hm hm hm hm hm hm!
text_simple: hm hm hm hm hm ha ha ha ha ha ha hm hm hm hm hm hm

name: drow_levelup_08
text: Hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm!
text_simple: hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm hm

name: dro_kill_01
text: I'll cut a notch with your name on it!
text_simple: ill cut a notch with your name on it

name: drow_kill_08
text: I thought they warned you not to speak with rangers.
text_simple: i thought they warned you not to speak with rangers

name: drow_kill_09
text: The lanes are lined with the likes of you.
text_simple: the lanes are lined with the likes of you

name: drow_kill_10
text: Many a grave is hidden in these woods.
text_simple: many a grave is hidden in these woods

name: drow_kill_11
text: The Drow have one less enemy now.
text_simple: the drow have one less enemy now

name: drow_kill_12
text: Let me get my arrows back, and then you can die.
text_simple: let me get my arrows back and then you can die

name: drow_kill_13
text: You were too noisy to live.
text_simple: you were too noisy to live

name: drow_kill_14
text: There are some things you weren't meant to see. Such as tomorrow.
text_simple: there are some things you werent meant to see such as tomorrow

name: drow_kill_15
text: We hardly knew you. Just as well.
text_simple: we hardly knew you just as well

name: drow_kill_16
text: I know I should respect the dead, but first you have to earn it.
text_simple: i know i should respect the dead but first you have to earn it

name: drow_kill_17
text: Now that you're dead, I find it easy to respect you.
text_simple: now that youre dead i find it easy to respect you

name: drow_rival_01
text: Don't quit your day job, Luna.
text_simple: dont quit your day job luna

name: drow_rival_02
text: Oh good, some genuine cat gut.
text_simple: oh good some genuine cat gut
criteria: Kill Isdrowranger Chance_10% IsEnemyLuna|Kill Isdrowranger Chance_10% IsEnemyMirana

name: drow_rival_03
text: My arrow found your arrow's mark.
text_simple: my arrow found your arrows mark

name: drow_rival_07
text: I heard your bones rattle with fear.
text_simple: i heard your bones rattle with fear

name: drow_rival_08
text: Clinkz, were you named after chattering teeth?
text_simple: clinkz were you named after chattering teeth

name: drow_rival_09
text: You met your match today, Clinkz.
text_simple: you met your match today clinkz

name: drow_rival_10
text: The olden ways are best, Sniper.
text_simple: the olden ways are best sniper

name: drow_rival_14
text: You're not out of the woods yet, Enchantress.
text_simple: youre not out of the woods yet enchantress

name: drow_rival_16
text: I was hiding in your shadow the whole time.
text_simple: i was hiding in your shadow the whole time

name: drow_rival_17
text: The woods have spoken, and they chose me.
text_simple: the woods have spoken and they chose me
criteria: Kill Isdrowranger Chance_20% IsEnemyFurion|Taunt Isdrowranger IsDrowTauntKeepAnEarOut

name: drow_rival_18
text: Let's put it to a vote.
text_simple: lets put it to a vote

name: drow_rival_19
text: Cold made you hard, but ice made you brittle.
text_simple: cold made you hard but ice made you brittle

name: drow_rival_20
text: There's more than one hunter in these woods.
text_simple: theres more than one hunter in these woods
criteria: Kill Isdrowranger Chance_10% IsEnemyBounty_Hunter|Kill Isdrowranger Chance_10% IsEnemyRiki
pretty_criteria: Killing Bounty Hunter (10% chance)|Killing Riki (10% chance)

name: drow_rival_21
text: No bear can stand to my bow.
text_simple: no bear can stand to my bow

text: A foundlings life is all a gift.

name: drow_death_12
text: Blown out on a cold wind.
text_simple: blown out on a cold wind

name: drow_fastres_01
text: I'm back before the arrow fired has fallen!

name: dro_rare_01
text: The mist that chills you keeps me warm.
text_simple: the mist that chills you keeps me warm

name: dro_rare_02
text: I walk alone, but the shadows are company enough.
text_simple: i walk alone but the shadows are company enough

name: dro_rare_03
text: The only sin is an ungodly racket.

text: Follow me into the forest shade, and none may spy on us.
